abstract: Leader of the machinists’ union at Boeing agreed to return to the bargaining table early Thursday, just hours after union members voted to strike over contract negotiations.
snippet: Leader of the machinists’ union at Boeing agreed to return to the bargaining table early Thursday, just hours after union members voted to strike over contract negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of the machinists’ union at the Boeing Company agreed to return to the bargaining table early Thursday, just hours after the members of the union voted to reject the company’s last contract offer and strike the aircraft maker.

headline.main: After Strike Vote, Boeing Union Agrees to Resume Talks
headline.print_headline: After Strike Vote, Boeing Union Agrees to Resume Talks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Assn of Machinists and Aerospace Workers
